item.description:
So many of you have come out to the Funky Monkey to enjoy Bob Raymond's soulful guitar and vocals, so I thought you might like to check out a new venue and support Bob in his first appearance at THE SPACE in Hamden.  This is a classic CT music joint, a bit off beat and fun.  There are two arenas, The Space and the Outer Space.  Bob is playing at the original Space.  There is food available, a vintage clothing shop, and lots of free parking.

 

This is an AFTON show, which means that booking in advance helps the performers a lot and saves you money on the show.  But whether you buy online or at the door, please remember that you are here to see BOB RAYMOND, as each person who identifies him ads to his standing with that booking agent. 

VERY IMPORTANT:  The best way to buy tickets is to go to Bab Raymond's Afton account:  https://tickets.aftonshows.com/BobRaymond  --That will give him full credit and give you a discounted price.   

For general info about The Space, directions, links to performer bios, etc., check out: http://www.thespacect.com/index.php  

Doors open at 6:30, but there are other performers.  I will try to update you closer to the date with a more precise time for Bob...but come and enjoy all acts...they should all be great!
item.name: Live Music and Good Times and the Space in Hamden
